titles.title: Break Forth Into Joy, Oh My Soul

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
As the sun comes up each morning to greet the day,
Break forth into joy, O my soul!
So God's Spirit rises in me to light my way,
Break forth into joy, O my soul!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Break forth into joy,
Break forth into joy, O my soul!
Break forth into joy,
Break forth into joy, O my soul!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
As your purging fire consumes me
I have strength to stand
Break forth into joy, O my soul!
I will be that man with Jesus
To redeem the land,
Break forth into joy, O my soul!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
When my spirit, soul and body
Are in one accord,
Break forth into joy, O my soul!
I will rule and reign with Jesus
In Your kingdom, Lord,
Break forth into joy, O my soul!
